description: Svelte is an open-source JavaScript-based application framework that allows developers to create web applications. Whereas other JavaScript-based application frameworks, such as React and Vue, allow developers to create applications that are compiled largely in-browser, Svelte allows developers to create applications that are compiled prior to being rendered in a browser. This allows Svelte web applications to load and run more quickly than React and Vue applications.
Source code files written using Svelte syntax are saved in SVELTE files. A SVELTE file may contain an application's top-level code or an application component.
